origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BankData.get_transaction_history', 'description': 'Get the transaction history of a bank for a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which to retrieve the transaction history, e.g., 'last_year'.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'transactions', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing transaction details.'}]}, {'name': 'AI.detect_fraud', 'description': 'Use AI algorithms to detect potential fraudulent transactions in a given dataset.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'transaction_data', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing transaction details.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'fraud_transactions', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing potential fraudulent transactions.'}]}, {'name': 'Analytics.analyze_fraud_patterns', 'description': 'Analyze the patterns and characteristics of detected fraudulent transactions.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'fraud_transactions', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing potential fraudulent transactions.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing analysis results of the fraudulent transactions.'}]}, {'name': 'Optimization.suggest_fraud_detection_improvements', 'description': 'Provide recommendations for optimizing the fraud detection system based on analysis results.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'A dictionary containing analysis results of the fraudulent transactions.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'optimization_suggestions', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing optimization suggestions.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取Bank of America过去一年的交易数据。接下来，使用人工智能算法识别出潜在的欺诈交易。然后，分析欺诈交易的模式和特征。最后，提供基于人工智能的欺诈检测系统优化建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去一年的交易数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
